name: 1980 (Full version)
description:
(<EPILEPSY WARNING!!!!>)

You just moved into a new house with your parents, and you're exploring the basement. 

Legends say someone got murdered while being forced to use a computer. The victim tried sending out emails for help through the computer, but the murderer got to the victim before they had a chance.

After looking around a bit, and getting used to the place,, you find a old tv with a old looking computer on the floor. You decide to plug it in, because why not? Maybe some cool videos or pictures are on it? 

You, the player continue the story, exploring the dusty old pc, uncovering the dark secrets it holds...
